question: 浪費
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>wander</kanji> around doing nothing at your own <kanji>expense</kanji> it will be a huge <vocabulary>waste</vocabulary> of money. It's not like you were doing or buying anything important, you were just wandering around, after all.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
